name: Dry Blood: Massacre
description:
DISCLAMER

This game is an approximately 10 minute long horror survival game I made in a month with a friend. It isn't very polished, with it being my second ever game. It is also just the alpha version. That being said, I hope you'll enjoy it none the less.

You woke up on a hospital bed. You have no idea who you are, where you are or how you got here. All you know is that your head is hurting like hell and bleeding, the smell of rotten flesh fills the air and you can hear something walking down the hall. You have nothing but a broken IV stand as a weapon and the will to kill.

Control's:

WASD - Move around

SPACE - Jump

Mouse 1/2 - Attack / Throw
